comments:
Description: Exception is thrown out when editting a template file.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a grid.
2. Insert another grid in a grid cell.
3. Transfer the second grid to a template item "grid1".
4. Transfer the first grid into a template item "grid2".
5. Double click on "grid2".
6. Double click on "grid1". NullPointerException is thrown out.

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.editors.schematic.editparts.PlaceHolderEditPart.performDirectEdit(PlaceHolderEditPart.java:164)
